newsitem.title: USA: TWA sets 3-day sale on certain routes.
newsitem.headline: TWA sets 3-day sale on certain routes.

text.p: Trans World Airlines Inc said Tuesday it set special fares to Florida, Hawaii and San Juan, Puerto Rico.
Reservations must be made through September 19 and tickets must be purchased within 72 hours of making a confirmed reservation. Tickets also must be purchased at least 14 days prior to departure.
Sale fares are valid for travel through December 18. Holidays and some other blackout dates, when the sale fares are not in effect, apply, TWA said.
A Saturday night stay is required and tickets are non-refundable.

Sample roundtrip fares include $650 between Chicago and Honolulu, compared with the existing fare of $748; Detroit and San Juan, $358, compared with $460; St. Louis and Orlando, Fla., $198, compared with $253, and Boston and San Juan, $228, compared with $431.
